# @ebay/geo-service-ebay 

[![Build Status](https://ci.altus.vip.ebay.com/ebaykrakn-4389/buildStatus/icon?job=geo-service-ebay)](https://ci.altus.vip.ebay.com/ebaykrakn-4389/job/geo-service-ebay) [![Dependency Status](https://appvalidator.vip.qa.ebay.com/nodejs/geo-service-ebay.svg)](https://appvalidator.vip.qa.ebay.com/nodejs/geo-service-ebay)
[![Code Coverage](https://badgeme.vip.qa.ebay.com/badge/sonar/v0/coverage/geo-service-ebay)](http://sonar/dashboard/index?id=geo-service-ebay)


Node client for ebay geo services

https://wiki.vip.corp.ebay.com/display/GEO/Geo+Config+Service

## Changelog

See   [CHANGELOG.MD](https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/geo-service-ebay/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#changelog)

### getGeoByCountryCode

Returns the geo information for a country based on countryCode and `X-EBAY-C-MARKETPLACE-ID` header.

**Default values**

```
    countryCode = 'US';
    headers['X-EBAY-C-MARKETPLACE-ID'] = 'EBAY-US';
```

### How to Use

```javascript
    var geoServ = require('@ebay/geo-service-ebay');

    ...
    var countryCode = 'US';
    var headers = {};
    headers['X-EBAY-C-MARKETPLACE-ID'] = 'EBAY-US';
    geoServ.getGeoByCountryCode(countryCode, headers, function (err, result) {

        ...
    });
```

### Provisioning 
Before you can use this module you must follow provision guidelines mentioned [here](https://wiki.vip.corp.ebay.com/display/IDSLocation/API)

### getGeoCountries

Returns the list of geocountries based on `X-EBAY-C-MARKETPLACE-ID` & `ACCEPT-LANGUAGE` headers.

**Default values**

```
    headers['X-EBAY-C-MARKETPLACE-ID'] = 'EBAY-US';
    headers['ACCEPT-LANGUAGE'] = 'en-US';
```
### How to Use

```javascript
    var geoServ = require('@ebay/geo-service-ebay');

    ...
    var headers = {};
    headers['X-EBAY-C-MARKETPLACE-ID'] = 'EBAY-US';
    headers['ACCEPT-LANGUAGE'] = 'en-US';
    geoServ.getGeoCountries(headers, function (err, result) {

        ...
    });
```
